prompt: I couldn't believe it when my dog died a few weeks ago. I honestly thought I was going to stay lonely forever. When my girlfriend asked me if I wanted to go look at dogs to cheer me up, I said no.

Right after I had my baby, my husband was working second shift so he didn't get home until 2am. I was changing the baby's diaper and the changing table was right in front of a window. The front porch is right in front of that window. As I'm changing her diaper, I hear people running up and down the porch and banging on the walls. After that, I changed her diaper in the living room until my husband got home. I'm glad all the doors and windows were locked.
I was on a trip to a heavy metal festival in Las Vegas. While there, my girlfriend broke up with me, and we were still staying in the same room.
My rottwieller passes a lot of gas  in the evenings.  It's so musky and it follows you wherever you go in the house.
I have tried three different times to complete a work task.  Each time I have failed.
My brother got a 4runner for this first car! I lowkey am pissed at him!
I am by myself most of the time in a isolated area. I only have animals as my friends.
I once ate a piece of cake found in the fridge.  After the first bite I looked down and saw spots of mold.
I pooed my pants one day at work. I have MS and sometimes during flare ups i have bowel control problems.
A friend of mine recently bought a new Corvette. It makes me so jealous!
I was bathing my dog in the backyard this weekend, and she got loose. She then went and rolled in the dirt getting extra filthy.
Yesterday my car ran out of oil and broke down. I could not believe I would let such a thing happen!
I waited in line for tickets to the new star wars movie for 2 days. After selling two tickets to the person in front of me, they informed me they were sold out for the evening.
I have been trying to lose weight in a group and while i made it to 4 lbs, my friends made it to 15. :(

One time I was going to a court hearing against my former place of employment to repeal a decision made to cancel my unemployment. I knew I would win because I had so much evidence against them and their shoddy work practices.

i really hate seeing people throw trash on the street like if it was a natural thing to do
My coworker received a promotion over me. I am envious of his newfound success.
It broke my heart today when I went to the grocery store and found out that they were out of Dean's French Onion Dip.
Taking a large amount of classes this upcoming semester.

I lost my car keys. I'm furious with myself.

I felt so disillusioned when I discovered someone who I admired for their vision was a jerk on a day-to-day basis.

my best friend is moving to another town and i dont know when i will get to see her again.
I managed to get all my school shopping done so the kids are ready for school next week!
One time my husband was acting a bit to helpful to a woman we know. He said he was only trying to be nice, but I felt he was being too friendly. Maybe I overreacted.
There is a few different girls that work with my husband that over the years have hit on him. I know I trust him but they still bother me.

My daughter called and said they were taking my newborn grandson to the doctor to have a chest xray because he was having some breathing trouble. I worried all day long until I got the phone call telling me everything was ok. They live far away so I tend to worry even more since I can't be there.
someone had pull a stick prank on me and slashed my car tires and bashed my windshield in at my apartment complex.

One night my children and I came home and came in through the back door. As I opened it, I saw a tall shadow in the hallway! It scared me so much, as I feared an intruder was in my home.

I ended up staying at home for the holidays, all my family lives in another state. I basically just sat at home in the dark watching lord of the rings.
A few weeks ago a coworker called in sick. I had to work twice as long as I normally would.

It so quiet and cold in my house. Wish my husband was home to keep me company. Trying to relax but keep hearing noises.

Some people in this country are just heartless. I watched someone throw their trash at a homeless man today.
I really wanted to get the part in the school rendition of a play. But my friend got it.
I went through a divorce, I had to leave my husband and daughter behind. It broke my heart and I felt so alone.
My father passed away in November, it's made me feel empty ever since.
I just broke up with my girlfriend, we were together for 8 years, i feel so empty.

I played volley ball in middle and high school, so we signed my two daughters up to play. When we went to the first practice, the coach said it was her first time coaching, so she asked if I could help some. It was an honor to help coach them, and I enjoyed it because I miss playing.
Felt scared while I was watching paranormal activity
I lost the book that my friend let me borrow. I feel so embarrassed.
I was really stressed out and grad school and had no choice but to drop out to keep my sanity.
yes i am going to one restaurant for survey is very guilty
All of my friends have moved away, when I still live and work in the place where I grew up. Many local people my age do drugs and stay out all night, so I just stay in and keep to myself.
I have been practicing my jump shot for months. I am read for a game of horse against my friends.
I got a call in the middle of the night during college that one of my best friends had been in a fatal car crash.
I felt isolated when we moved to Hong Kong -- I had a 6 month old, a husband that needed to start traveling to Australia immediately, and just didn't know anyone yet!
I hate driving at night because my vision isn't that great
My car wouldn't start today after work. I had to get a jump start!
My family came to visit me recently. I always get nervous before having visitors.
I had just watched the notebook. The main character ended up forgetting everything about his life. He died at the end
I forgot to pick up a bag of chips for my son from the grocery store.
I felt betrayed when my girlfriend kissed another guy at a party. She was drunk, true. But still.

My husband is going through the process of quitting smoking and he also has drama going on with his parents that isn't his fault. There is nothing that I can do to make the situation better for him, so it makes me sad.
I have a presentation for work on monday, about our hiring policys and how to retain more people. I know I have this! I have been preparing all weekend.
I almost lost my mind the other day when I heard gunshots right outside my house. I thought someone was going to come in and shoot me!
I felt very lonely when my partner decided to leave me for someone else.
I have appeared for a driving license thrice and still I have not being able to crack it.
Last night there was a fly in the bedroom while I was trying to sleep. It kept landing on my face
One morning my mother came to pick my daughter up for school and told me she saw my daughter's cat dead outside.
When I can home, my cat was laying on the pile of laundry that I had pulled out of the dryer before work. Now it's covered in hair.
I felt really nervous after i agreed to meet my girlfriend's parents. I lost few pounds on the weeks that led up to it
I feel guilty because I couldn't go to my friends party
I stole some candy from the grocery store. I wanted to see if I could get away with it.
One time I was walking on the sidewalk to my next class and I tripped on some steps. I fell flat on my face in front of a bunch of people.
I feel so bad about myself, ate too many sweets. I'm suppose to be on a diet.
The other day was really just one of those off days. I couldn't get myself together that day. I went to the store and looked like I was drinking, which I dont, because I kept running into everything.
I work for a company and we just found out the the person who works in our accounting department has been stealing money from us for years. It is revolting.
Today was the first day of school for my kids. It's been so quiet here.
I had a solo competition last week for cello. I was well prepared and knew my music well. I felt great walking into that room.
I felt really good about myself when i got a job at a local firm. I felt a sudden boost in my self worth
I was partially raised by my grandparents and my grandmother recently passed away. She had a good long life though.

Something which really irks me is someone queue jumping. The other day I was standing at the deli counter of my local store and some guy just walked up and started asking for stuff. The employee served him, too.
I recently went to eat a restaurant that was not very clean. The whole place had an odd odor and made me uncomfortable.
Not long ago we had a storm that was horrible. Couldn't even see 5 feet outside the windows. The next thing we know all of our phones went off telling us to seek shelter while a tornado went by.

I was supposed to meet a friend on his boat at a marina. I'd never seen his boat but he described it to me.  Unfortunately when I got to the marina he wasn't there, so I got on the first boat that looked like what he described.  But it wasn't his!  Fortunately my friend saw me before the boat's owner did and I got off and on the right one.
i hate going outdoors during rain season there is mosquitos everywhere i go i cannot stand them
The other day at the skatepark my daughter went down the big ramp! It was so cool to watch her go.
disappointed: I was so sad to find out what she had done. Found it on her facebook message history..
One time I had been to a job interview. I was told that I would hear back in a week. I could not wait to find out if I got the job
I go up with my skydiving students daily and I feel confident in their skills
I saw a scorpion in my house. It was huge and it ran under my couch before I could kill it.
I was devastated when I had to put my chihuahua to sleep not to long back.  She had congestive heart failure.  She was my constant companion and I loved her so much!
We went to Florida for a vacation and when we got to the bridge and toll booths, the line was 30 minutes of wait, after a 7 hour drive!
I drank a lot of alcohol at a BBQ party and puked.

I was headed to a rave with a small group of friends. When we reached our last destination before the party, one of the people who was supposed to go called and told us she would be there shortly. We ended up waiting several hours only for her not to show up.
The last time we went to the fair, I tripped over a big cord and fell! There were so many people around that saw me fall!
I ate like a whole cake last night! It was so good I couldn't stop eating it
Last month I came home from work and noticed my cat wasn't feeling well, so I rushed her to the vet. I had to put her down.
I think the most lonely I have felt was when we moved overseas, my husband had to travel out of *that* country for business, and I had a new baby and dog to keep me company!
My son just graduated from high school! He has worked so hard, and he even earned a scholarship.
I am trying to stop drinking soda and I have prayed and asked God to help me with this. The problem is that I am addicted to soda so I am finding it hard to quit. This causes feelings of guilt.
My dog just passed away two nights ago. She was 12 years old.
I recently forgot I owed a little bit of money to my mother in law for something. It ended up being ok but being reminded wasn't that pleasent.
My long term boyfriend and I broke up recently. I'm so lost right now.
When planning my wedding the caterer we were trying to hire was completely ignoring my wife every time she tried to talk to her.
I left my dog alone in the house when I went to get the mail. While I was gone she got in the cat box and ate the cat poop, super gross.

We were over at our friend's house for a dinner and I was in the kitchen helping her cook. I had melted butter in a baking dish to make dessert, and I poured cold milk into it like the recipe said to do. It ended up cracking the dish. I felt bad. I offered to buy her a new one.
I was supposed to go on a work trip but my child go sick. I was so worried to tell my boss that  i wouldn't be able to go. It was an important trip and it was too late for someone to replace me.
Sometimes I feel like I'm alone for no reason
Once I was ashamed b/c my husband asked me not to tell my mom that he was actually busy when she needed his help with something.  I ended up telling her and he found out and was pretty upset with me.
I did not invite my sister to a party she wanted to come to. She felt hurt.
My two best friends are going on vacation next week and I won't have anyone else at work to goof off with.
going near hights really makes me scared, i cannot go on reoller coasters because im afraid of heights
was travelling 14 hours internationally. First flight got delayed and the airline would not apologize and provide altenative
I had a customer sign the wrong form today, I feel bad because I'll have to ask them to sign something again.
My friend whom I haven't seen in a long time came to visit. She drove up in a really nice car and was dressed really well. She married a very wealthy man and I just a bit envious
My roommate has been gone all week. I don't have anything to do without him here.
One time I moved to a new city and didn't know anyone. I had to go out alone to do things
i have been feels really stressed and disappointed
My boss scolded me for something I didn't do.
I recently found out that my girlfriend has been cheating on me with another woman. She promised me that she wasn't that type of girl. Needless to say, I'm quite upset about it.
My house is a mess and I've got people coming over later this evening.
I didn't tell my friend when her boyfriend hit on me. I felt very bad and wrong for that, even though I turned him down, of course.
I was in the grocery store and dropped a can of pasta sauce and it made a huge mess.
I recently had a wonderful experience with a woman I really like. The night ended poorly and I came across very disappointed with the ending.
I tripped and fell in front of some people.
i was proud to see my kid winning in painting competition.. she seems like a born artist
I have Lupus so i am not able to get out of the house much b/c I am so sick.  It makes me really lonely b/c I don't have many friends since I am not able to go out and hang out
One time I had a dream where i was being held down by a shadow demon with red eyes. I couldn't move or scream even though I wanted to. It was the most scared I've ever been.
I watched a little drop his candy bar on the ground. He then bent down picked it up and ate it! Didn't even wipe it off.
People who  steal make me crazy. I watched some people come into my driveway and try to take my spare gas can!
I was talking to a friend of mine who is from England about our president
